adjectives.description: interdisciplinary (comparative more interdisciplinary, superlative most interdisciplinary)

entries.meaning: Of or pertaining to multiple distinct academic disciplines or fields of study.
examples: This journal is interdisciplinary: it has articles on everything from biology to electrical engineering.

entries.meaning: Of or pertaining to a linkage between multiple distinct academic disciplines or fields of study.
examples: The interdisciplinary co-operation at this university is very impressive.
